landingPage.title: Welcome to your IoTCloudStarter App
landingPage.subtitle: A highly customizable IoTCloudStarter application to manage Live Apps cases

highlights.title: Engage
highlights.content: Handle all case related requests in a single place - e.g. create cases, action cases, approve requests.

highlights.title: Collaborate
highlights.content: Collaborate on cases using unstructured data such as notes and documents.

highlights.title: Track
highlights.content: Track and respond to high priority cases using actions; review status using audit trails.
